lead_paragraph: AMES--Steven. For my beloved uncle, brother, best friend Steven Ames. The entire Hammond/Stubgen family shall think of you always with love and respect. I will miss talking to you almost every day. With Love, Dana, Oliver, Miles, Jonathan, Nicky and Charlotte. 1/3
